ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cphlmod | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. LMod ) |

| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_cphsca | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 3 | #P_cphsubrg | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 3 | #P_isclm | |- ( W e. CMod <-> ( W e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` W ) = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) /\ ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 4, 5, 6 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. CMod ) |
